content: Hi there. Is anyone here working for or with Surescripts to exchange MedicationStatement information. I want to know if they support a FHIR interface and also get more info into licensing and integration.

@Joseph Athman, @Nancy Olson, @Curtis Pavlicek @Daniel VanderWeyst @Joseph Shook @Scott Brown: Not sure which of you is most appropriate, but hopefully one of you can provide an answer for forward on to the appropriate individual

Surescripts doesn't support a FHIR interface for ePrescribing in general. We are using FHIR for a few products in specific ways, but it is not possible to do something like send a prescription using FHIR at the moment. Surescripts using the NCPDP SCRIPT standard to do that. Hope that helps.
